item.title: 稀土并不稀有，但这并不重要
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 加拿大汽车销量回升至大流行前水平
item.description: 据 DesRosiers 汽车咨询公司估计，尽管与美国的贸易中断造成了动荡，但加拿大去年的轻型汽车销量仍达到了 2019 年以来的最高水平。【原文：Light vehicle sales in Canada last year reached their highest level since 2019 despite the turmoil caused by trade disruptions with the US, according to estimates from DesRosiers Automotive Consultants Inc.】

item.title: Nvidia首席执行官的讲话推动Sandisk上涨1000
item.description: 在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）在科技大会 CES 上发表评论，强调内存和存储的需求之后，Sandisk 公司股价周二大涨 25%，创下 2 月份以来的最佳盘中表现纪录。首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）在科技大会 CES 上发表评论，强调了对内存和存储的需求。【原文：Sandisk Corp. shares jumped as much as 25% Tuesday, hitting a record in their best intraday performance since February, after Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang highlighted the need for memory and storage in comments at the tech conference CES.】

item.title: Citadel 证券公司称 "一月效应 "有望推动美股反弹
item.description: 据 Citadel Securities 公司称，随着早期资本流动和市场涨势的扩大，今年 "一月效应 "的承诺看起来非常真实，为整个美国股市的上涨奠定了基础。【原文：The promise of the “January effect” looks all too real this year as early capital flows and a broadening of the market rally set the stage for gains across US equities, according to Citadel Securities.】

item.title: 威德福首席执行官称委内瑞拉是石油行业的 "巨大机遇
item.description: 世界上最大的石油服务供应商之一威德福国际公司称，在美国抓获加勒比海国家领导人尼古拉斯-马杜罗之后，委内瑞拉为该行业带来了 "巨大的机遇"。【原文：Weatherford International Plc, one of the world’s biggest oil service providers, called Venezuela a “massive opportunity” for the industry following the US capture of the Caribbean nation’s leader, Nicolás Maduro.】

item.title: 收购公司 Hg 将以 64 亿美元的交易价格将 OneStream 私有化
item.description: 收购公司 Hg 已同意收购 OneStream Inc.【原文：Buyout firm Hg has agreed to acquire OneStream Inc. in a deal valuing the financial software maker at an equity value of about $6.4 billion.】

item.title: 芝加哥最大电力公司签署协议，防止数据中心增加能源支出
item.description: 芝加哥最大的电力公司联邦爱迪生公司（Commonwealth Edison Co.【原文：Chicago’s biggest electricity company, Commonwealth Edison Co., is taking steps to prevent the data center boom backing the rise of artificial intelligence from raising energy bills for consumers.】

item.title: 俄罗斯精炼燃料流量因柴油激增而创下四个月新高
item.description: 由于从波罗的海港口运往附近市场的柴油量增加，俄罗斯石油产品出口量在 12 月份上升到四个月来的最高点。【原文：Russian oil product exports rose in December to a four-month high, driven by stronger diesel shipments from ports in the Baltic Sea to nearby markets.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉黑暗舰队消失，雪佛龙公司 11 艘船整装待发
item.description: 美国军队推翻尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolas Maduro）总统后，雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.）预订的一支小型舰队正驶往委内瑞拉，成为该国唯一的石油出口商。【原文：A small armada of ships booked by Chevron Corp. is sailing to Venezuela as the company emerges as the only exporter of the country’s oil following the ouster of President Nicolas Maduro by US forces.】

item.title: 机器人真空吸尘器制造商 Roborock 展示带腿爬楼梯模型
item.description: 中国机器人吸尘器品牌Roborock发布了一款概念设备，它有两条腿，可以在人们家中爬楼梯，这是向普通消费者推销家用机器人概念的一个华而不实的例子。【原文：Roborock, a Chinese robotic vacuum cleaner brand, unveiled a concept device with two legs that can climb stairs in people’s homes, a flashy example of efforts to sell ordinary consumers on the idea of home robots.】

item.title: 普尔特瞄准信用定价，Equifax 和 TransUnion 股价下跌
item.description: 在联邦住房金融局局长比尔-普尔特（Bill Pulte）指责美国最大的信用报告公司提高价格之后，这些公司的股价受到重挫。【原文：Shares of America’s largest credit-reporting companies are getting pummeled after Federal Housing Finance Agency Director Bill Pulte called out the firms for raising prices.】

item.title: 捷克政府在预算缺口达到 140 亿美元后寻求节约
item.description: 捷克共和国的预算赤字超过了 2025 年的目标，使得新政府不得不为其优先事项寻找节余和资金。【原文：The Czech Republic’s budget deficit exceeded the target for 2025, leaving the new government scrambling to find savings and financing for its priorities.】

item.title: 英伟达首席财务官称营收预测更加乐观
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席财务官科莱特-克雷斯（Colette Kress）说，由于需求强劲，这家芯片制造商在 10 月份给出的收入预测变得更加乐观。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Financial Officer Colette Kress said a bullish revenue forecast that the chipmaker gave in October has only gotten brighter due to strong demand.】

item.title: 高盛警告美国电网到 2030 年将面临电力紧张问题
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Almost all US power grids will lack critical spare capacity by 2030 as demand surges to supply data centers, with bottlenecks threatening to hand China an edge in the artificial-intelligence boom, according to an analyst at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 如果没有 2026 年预算，法国政府预计赤字率将接近 5.4
item.description: 法国财政部长罗兰-莱斯库雷（Roland Lescure）表示，由于议会未能在去年年底前通过预算法案，2026 年的财政赤字可能超过经济产出的 5.4%。【原文：French Finance Minister Roland Lescure said the 2026 deficit could exceed 5.4% of economic output after parliament failed to adopt a budget bill before the end of last year.】

item.title: 壳牌达成收购雪佛龙安哥拉石油区块股份的协议
item.description: 总部设在伦敦的能源巨头壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）周二称，该公司签署了一项协议，从雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.）在非洲南部国家安哥拉的子公司手中收购安哥拉近海两个石油区块35%的股份。【原文：Shell Plc signed a deal to acquire a 35% stake in two oil blocks offshore Angola from Chevron Corp.’s subsidiary in the southern African nation, the London-based energy giant said Tuesday.】

item.title: 资金紧张的美国公立学校出售了十多年来最多的市政债券
item.description: 2025 年，美国公立学校大举举债，创下了十多年来市政债务销售额最高的一年，因为入学率下降和通货膨胀加剧使各学区的预算捉襟见肘。【原文：American public schools went on a borrowing binge in 2025, marking the sector’s biggest year for municipal debt sales in over a decade as dipping enrollment and elevated inflation strain districts’ budgets.】

item.title: 赞比亚抑制美元汇率支撑克瓦查反弹至世界水平
item.description: 赞比亚当局发布了一项指令，限制外汇的使用，并推动公司将美元换成当地现金，此后赞比亚货币将年底的涨势延续到了2026年。【原文：Zambia’s currency extended a year-end rally into 2026 after the authorities issued a directive that curbed the use of foreign exchange and pushed companies to swap dollars for local cash.】

item.title: 尽管特朗普信誓旦旦地表示要重塑爱尔兰企业税负，但爱尔兰企业税负仍在上升
item.description: 尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）誓言要将美国利润从跨国公司中心转移到爱尔兰，但爱尔兰去年的公司税收入仍出现了激增。【原文：Ireland recorded a surge in corporation tax receipts last year, despite vows by US President Donald Trump to reshore American profits from the multinational hub.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉曝光 "ETF 在马杜罗下台数日后向美国证券交易委员会提交申请
item.description: 委内瑞拉拥有 13.6 万亿美元的资产和近 5000 种产品，几乎什么都有交易所交易基金。不久的将来，委内瑞拉股票也会有交易所交易基金；或者至少在委内瑞拉有足够业务的公司也会有交易所交易基金。【原文：With $13.6 trillion in assets and nearly 5,000 products, there’s an exchange-traded fund for almost everything. Soon, there could be one for Venezuelan stocks as well — or at least for companies with enough presence in the country.】

item.title: 特许公司在考克斯交易前对 17.5 亿美元垃圾债务进行再融资
item.description: Charter Communications Inc. 将在美国垃圾债券市场出售 17.5 亿美元的债券，为 2026 年和 2027 年到期的债务再融资。【原文：Charter Communications Inc. is selling $1.75 billion of bonds in the US junk bond market to refinance debt coming due in 2026 and 2027.】

item.title: 报刊称智利卡斯特任命豪尔赫-奎罗斯为财务总监
item.description: 据当地报纸《金融日报》周二报道，智利当选总统何塞-安东尼奥-卡斯特将提名豪尔赫-基罗兹（Jorge Quiroz）担任财政部长。【原文：Chile’s President-elect José Antonio Kast will nominate Jorge Quiroz as finance minister, local newspaper Diario Financiero reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 棉花创八周新高，因对供应和油价持谨慎态度
item.description: 纽约棉花期货飙升至八周以来的最高点，因为交易商在权衡今年供应趋紧的前景和石油市场的波动性。【原文：Cotton futures in New York surged to the highest in eight weeks as traders weigh an outlook for tighter supplies this year and volatility in oil markets.】

item.title: 环球公司与 Nvidia 在人工智能音乐创作和发现方面开展合作
item.description: 环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group NV）正与英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp）合作，提升人工智能在音乐发现和创作中的作用，唱片公司正努力利用这一快速发展的技术，同时控制人工智能对其唱片目录带来的风险。【原文：Universal Music Group NV is partnering with Nvidia Corp. to boost the role of artificial intelligence in music discovery and creation, as record labels seek to capitalize on the fast-growing technology while managing the risks AI poses to their catalogs.】

item.title: 镍飙升逾 10%，中国买盘助推金属飙升
item.description: 镍在伦敦飙升了 10%以上，创下三年多来的最大涨幅，因为投资者对中国的兴趣激增，推动了金属市场的广泛反弹。【原文：Nickel spiked by more than 10% in London, notching the biggest gain in more than three years as surging investor interest in China helps to turbocharge a broad rally in metals markets.】

item.title: 10 年期国债收益率相对于 2 年期国债收益率接近 2025 年高点
item.description: 周二，美国国债接近一个关键的里程碑，10 年期国债收益率达到近九个月来相对于两年期国债利率的最高水平，这表明交易商押注美联储将在 2026 年进一步降息。【原文：US Treasuries approached a key milestone Tuesday as 10-year yields reached the highest level relative to two-year rates in nearly nine months, signaling traders’ bets on further Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts in 2026.】

item.title: 赞比亚与中国就潜在货币互换问题举行早期会谈
item.description: 赞比亚财政部一位高级官员说，赞比亚与中国就潜在的货币互换举行了初步会谈，这可能有助于降低与这个南部非洲国家最大的双边债权人打交道的风险。【原文：Zambia held preliminary talks with China on a potential currency swap that could help mitigate risks in dealings with the southern African nation’s largest bilateral creditor, a senior finance ministry official said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行二把手之争日趋激烈，立陶宛推举萨奇乌斯为二把手
item.description: 立陶宛正在加入欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）继任者的竞争行列，前财政部长里曼塔斯-萨齐乌斯（Rimantas Sadzius）现已成为第二把交椅越来越多的竞争者之一。【原文：Lithuania is joining the race to succeed European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos, with former finance chief Rimantas Sadzius now among a growing group of contenders for the No. 2 job.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Freenet 旗下的 Waipu.TV 已与花旗和贝伦贝格就德国首次公开募股达成协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Freenet AG 控制的德国流媒体平台 Waipu.TV 已选择花旗集团和贝伦贝格公司作为其今年可能进行的首次公开募股的全球协调人。【原文：Freenet AG-controlled German streaming platform Waipu.TV has selected Citigroup Inc. and Berenberg as global coordinators for its potential initial public offering this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官在 CES 上发表演讲后，数据中心冷却系统股票下挫
item.description: 在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）首席执行官的言论引发了人们对数据中心对其产品需求的担忧之后，冷却系统制造商的股票周二大跌。【原文：Makers of cooling systems saw their stocks plunge Tuesday after comments by Nvidia Corp.’s chief executive raised fears about demand for their products from data centers.】
